name: SimpleShips
description:
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Simple Ships ® 

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

You are stuck in a universe full of war, terror and hazard. You have been sent on a mission of Recon, to see if you can find any survivors. You jump into hyperspace but something goes wrong. The dials and buttons are flashing red, and sirens screaming. You stop, and appear to be in an asteroid belt. You try to fly away, but some sort of gravitational pull keeps you in the line of site. You have to avoid the meteors for as long as possible, and try to escape.

How to Play:

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Press >SPACEBAR< to change the direction of the ship

>ESC< to pause
